name: Narrator
text: Lucas is a enginner and he was sent to study a strange planet in a distant solar system.
This Planet is Nera, no sunlight in here.

name: Narrator
text: He misscalculated the aproximation with the planet, crashing on it.

name: Narrator
text: He get stuck in a room, just having a crank to generate eletric energy from cinetic motion.

name: Lucas
text: So, here I'm. Lost in a planet without a sunlight.
Click on the objects and use 'esc' to close the windows. Use the resources to open the doors.
